title: Decimal to Binary
statement:
# Decimal to Binary

Write a program that converts a decimal number to binary.

## Problem Description

Given a non-negative integer N in base 10, convert it to its binary (base 2) representation.

## Input Format

A single line containing a non-negative integer N.

## Output Format

The binary representation of N (without leading zeros, except for 0 itself).

## Constraints

- 0 ≤ N ≤ 10^9
